posts.post_content:
Looking to pick up any of the following:

Stephen Toole - Rochester
Bill Bishop - Syracuse
Cupid Childs - Syracuse
Doc Oberlander - Syracuse
Toole is the only Rochester player in the set. The other two players you have listed as Rochester are actually on Syracuse.
Corrected the above post.  Thanks for the info!

Good luck locating these cards, they are tougher but are out there.  Here is an old thread that studies both the confirmed and potential International Association players within the Old Judge set including those from Rochester and Syracuse.

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=165400[/url]

[quote name="Joe_G." post=1573000]Good luck locating these cards, they are tougher but are out there.  Here is an old thread that studies both the confirmed and potential International Association players within the Old Judge set including those from Rochester and Syracuse.

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=165400[/url][/QUOTE]


He speaks the truth for Toole. Team type collectors like myself have just one player from Rochester to choose from and all of those one player teams are tough to find and can be pricey, but when Rochester comes up for sale, a few people will want it I'm sure. Luckily I got mine a long time ago so you don't have to worry about me bidding
Thanks for all the great info. Hopefully some will turn up soon.

John,

I  think I know which is your favorite OJ team to buy - Indianapolis...  I bet you have more OJs with and Indy player on it than any other team (well, maybe not Pittsburgh)...
